summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for Deutsche Bank Trust Co. Americas for the period from October 1, 2017, to October 31, 2017. It details deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest payments, highlighting a significant outgoing transfer to the Cancer Research Wellness Institute.

events.title: Outgoing Transfer to Cancer Research Wellness Institute
events.description: A transfer of $25,800.00 was made to the Cancer Research Wellness Institute.

events.title: Interest Payment
events.description: An interest payment of $80.35 was credited to the account.

keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $339,530.40 on October 1, 2017.
A total of $25,800.00 was transferred to the Cancer Research Wellness Institute on October 2, 2017.
The ending balance as of October 31, 2017, was $314,610.75.
The document includes details about service charges and overdraft fees, which were both reported as $0.00 for the statement period.
Interest earned during the period was $80.35, with an annual percentage yield of 0.30%.
